original: Borgström, Ivar, apotekare, Karlskrona, f. 18/4/82 i Karlskrona av apot. Axel B. o. Tina Åberg. G. 24 m. Millan Widmark. Barn: Axel f. 25, d. 35. — Stud:ex. 02, farm. kand. 06, apot:ex. 11. Tjg. å olika apot. samt stud. i uti. 11-12, anst. å Göta Lejon i Karlskrona sed. 13, dess inneh. sed. 17. Led. av styr. f. sydöstra krets, av Sv:es apot:förb. 20’-36, ordf. sed. 37, led. av fullm. f. Sv:es apot:förb. 35-40 samt sed. 46, led. av centr:styr. f. Sv:es apot:förb. 40-44, v. ordf. där 42-43, led. av apot. värder:nd sed. 39, led. av styr. f. Karlskrona stads komm. aff :verk sed. 16, led. av styr. f. Ö. Blek. Järnv. A-B 19-43, dess verkst. dir. 32-43, styr:led. i A-B Trossö 17, ordf. 30, verkst. dir. sed. 37, led. av styr. f. J. A. Borgströms ’stift. o. v. ordf, 25, ordf. fr. 41, led. av styr. f. istift. Bostäder i Karlskr. 42, led. av styr. f. Karlskrona luftsk :fören. sed. 37, ordf. där sed. 39, ordf. i Ö. Blek. landst :fören., v. ordf. i Blek. landst:-förb., v. ordf. o. v. flottiljchef i Karlskrona friv. mo torbåts fiLottilj 22-25, ordf. 25. RVO, GM, Landst :SM, RLSF förtj :t i guld.
translated: Borgström, Ivar, pharmacist, Karlskrona, b. 18/4/82 in Karlskrona to pharmacist Axel B. and Tina Åberg. Married in 1924 to Millan Widmark. Children: Axel b. 1925, d. 1935. — Graduated from high school in 1902, earned a degree in pharmacy in 1906, became a licensed pharmacist in 1911. Worked at various pharmacies and studied abroad from 1911-1912. Employed by Göta Lejon in Karlskrona since 1913, and its owner since 1917. Member of the board of the Southeastern district, Swedish Pharmacy Association from 1920-1936, chairman since 1937, member of the full assembly of the Swedish Pharmacy Association from 1935-1940 and since 1946, member of the central board of the Swedish Pharmacy Association from 1940-1944, vice chairman from 1942-1943, member of the pharmacy valuation board since 1939, member of the board of the Karlskrona city business committee since 1916, member of the board of Ö. Blek. Railway Ltd. from 1919-1943, managing director from 1932-1943, board member of A-B Trossö since 1917, chairman in 1930, managing director since 1937, member of the board of J.A. Borgström's foundation and vice chairman since 1925, chairman since 1941, member of the board of  Istift. Bostäder i Karlskr. in 1942, member of the board of the Karlskrona air association since 1937, chairman since 1939, chairman of the Ö. Blek. county association, vice chairman of the Blek. county federation, and vice commander and fleet commander of the Karlskrona volunteer motorboat flotilla from 1922-1925, chairman in 1925. Received the Royal Order of Vasa, the Order of the Sword, the Swedish County Sports Federation Medal of Merit in gold.

additionalProperty.name: Swedish County Sports Federation Medal of Merit
